pkgmetadata.longdescription: *************************************************************AGS Toolbox - Utility to manage different AGS Editor versions*************************************************************AGS Toolbox is a PyQt tool to manage different versions of theAdventure Game Studio Editor, side by side, along with yourgame projects!Windows install and run-----------------------In Windows, install Python 3, and then open `cmd.exe` and type (press enter after): python -m pip install agstoolboxTo run, you can type the following in `cmd.exe` or the `run...` prompt python -m agstoolbox
